item.title: Presenting Android terminal with Termux (EdLug)
item.description: Last night, I presented about Termux to EdLug, the Edinburgh Linux User group (see the event page on meetup.com) in a talk titled “The freedom of shelling out on Android”. It was tons of fun showing off how your Android phone/tablet getting a terminal unlocks a powerful tool! Termux running vim, gcc, strace, with tmux splitting screen. Credit: Termux website I’ve made the slides available on this website, click on the slide below.
